markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Gnoll Cultist](/Monsters.aspx?ID=230)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Gnoll cultists serve as their clans’ spiritual guides and conduits to the divine. As often as not, their influence drives entire gnoll civilizations to commit atrocious acts of violence and enslavement. Lamashtu and Rovagug are favored deities of gnoll cultists, and many gnolls believe their kind was in fact birthed from the womb of the Mother of Monsters. Some gnoll clans worship lesser-known demon lords or entire pantheons of sinister patrons.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Gnoll_GnollCultist.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Gnoll Cultist](/Monsters.aspx?ID=230)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 179

**Perception** +8; darkvision

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17)

**Skills**
[Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +7, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [wooden religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
falchion +10 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d10+3 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 22, spell attack +10
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Magic Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=182)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (x4), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)

**Pack Attack**   A gnoll cultist deals 1d4 extra damage to any creature that’s within reach of at least two of the gnoll cultist's allies.

**Rugged Travel**   A gnoll ignores the first square of difficult terrain it moves into each time it Steps or Strides.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-54" />
name: Gnoll Cultist
